mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Foodpubpur VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(foodpubpurkey)+1,1) FROM FOODPUBPUR), 1, 1, #{title}, to_char(sysdate,'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{content},#{loc}, #{meetcnt},#{paytype},0,0)
mapper.select: SELECT u.NICKNAME nickname, f.TITLE title, f.WRITEDATE writedate, f.CONTENT content , f.LOC loc , f.MEETCNT meetcnt, f.PAYTYPE paytype, b.BOARDNAME boardname FROM FOODPUBPUR f , USERS u , BOARD b WHERE f.USERKEY = u.USERKEY AND f.BOARDKEY = b.BOARDKEY AND f.FOODPUBPURKEY = #{fppkey}

SELECT f.FOODPUBPURKEY fppkey , f.TITLE title , f.LOC loc , f.WRITEDATE writedate , u.NICKNAME nickname , f.viewcnt viewcnt FROM FOODPUBPUR f , USERS u WHERE f.USERKEY = u.USERKEY ORDER BY fppkey DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE Foodpubpur SET viewcnt = viewcnt+1 WHERE FOODPUBPURKEY = #{fppkey}
mapper.select: SELECT fc.FCOMMENTKEY commkey, fc.COMMCONTENTS commcontent ,fc.COMMDATE commdate , u.NICKNAME nickname FROM FOODPUBPUR f, FPPCOMM fc , USERS u WHERE fc.fppkey = f.FOODPUBPURKEY AND fc.USERKEY = u.USERKEY AND f.FOODPUBPURKEY = #{fppkey} ORDER BY fc.FCOMMENTKEY desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fppcomm VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(FCOMMENTKEY)+1,1) FROM fppcomm),1,#{commcontents},sysdate,#{fppkey})
mapper.update: UPDATE FOODPUBPUR SET TITLE = #{title}, WRITEDATE = SYSDATE , CONTENT = #{content} , LOC = #{loc}, MEETCNT = #{meetcnt}, PAYTYPE = #{paytype} WHERE FOODPUBPURKEY = #{foodpubpurkey}
